lead_paragraph: 17-year-old Eli (Spencer Daniels, Star Trek) has just moved with his family deep into the backwoods of Kentucky to work on the isolated farm of the town recluse, Waylon (Brad Dourif, Halloween I&II). Inexplicably drawn into the strange forest that
